Property

Class Railroad

  • java.lang.Object
    • Property.Space
      • Property.Property
        • Property.Railroad

  • public class Railroad
extends Property
    The Railroad class extends Property, inheriting all parameters from it. This class specifically calculates the rent for railroad properties.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Railroad

        public Railroad(int owner,
                int location,
                java.lang.String name,
                int price,
                int game)
        Constructors - 5 parameters
        Parameters:
        owner - int stores the playerID that owns the property
        location - int stores the space on the board where the property is located
        name - String that holds the name of the property
        price - int stores the banks price for the property
        game - int stores the gameID for when multiple games are running at once

        price - int stores the banks price for the property
        mortgaged - boolean stores whether the railroad is mortgaged
        game - int stores the gameID for when multiple games are running at once
